comment.body: Feel free to post a zite you have created for public critique. In fact, clone this zite, make the changes you suggest and then the current dev can decide for themselves which is  better to continue with.
comment.body_p: Feel free to post a zite you have created for public critique. In fact, clone this zite, make the changes you suggest and then the current dev can decide for themselves which is  better to continue with.

comment.body: There was an issue where I couldn't point it directly at the site as it points to a particular topic. I have copied the content to a blank page referencing the link for now as I was unable to directly clone the topic page with content as well.

topic.title: freeadvert.bit
topic.body: I'm wanting to point this at an advertisement for somebody's services or z/site. I see in the future this rotating relatively consistently but amongst the same ads. If anyone wants to just post your z/site details here and I'll start the rotation.
topic.body_p: I'm wanting to point this at an advertisement for somebody's services or z/site. I see in the future this rotating relatively consistently but amongst the same ads. If anyone wants to just post your z/site details here and I'll start the rotation.
